pageSetting.title: 机构考核得分明细查询

attribute.value: select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='1'
select distinct pz.wdmc as key, pz.wdmc as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh where fa.khdx='1' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$

select distinct pz.khzbdh as key, case when zb.khzbdh is null then pz.xmmc else zb.khzbmc end as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.khzbdh=pz.khzbdh where fa.khdx='1' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$ and pz.wdmc = '$wdmc$'

select distinct jglb.lbdh as key,jglb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='1' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc,jglb.lbmc, khfa.famc,zbpz.wdmc, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yyjg.yyjg,yyjg.zbz,yyjg.jhz, zbpz.bdz,zbpz.fdz, yyjg.yysm from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on yyjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq left join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh where 1=1 and khfa.fabh = $fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and zbpz.wdmc = '$wdmc$' and zbpz.khzbdh = $khzbdh$ and jglb.lbdh = '$jglb$' and khfa.yyzlbh=2 and khfa.khdx='1' order by khfa.fabh desc,zbpz.wdmc,yyjg.yyjg desc,jg.khdxdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc,jglb.lbmc, khfa.famc,zbpz.wdmc, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yyjg.yyjg,yyjg.zbz,yyjg.jhz, zbpz.bdz,zbpz.fdz, yyjg.yysm from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join khfa_fapz khfa on khfa.fabh = yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on yyjg.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq left join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on khzb.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh left join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on zbpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and zbpz.khzbdh=yyjg.khzbdh where 1=1 and khfa.fabh = $fabh$ and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and zbpz.wdmc = '$wdmc$' and zbpz.khzbdh = $khzbdh$ and jglb.lbdh = '$jglb$' and khfa.yyzlbh=2 and khfa.khdx='1' order by khfa.fabh desc,zbpz.wdmc,yyjg.yyjg desc,jg.khdxdh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key,famc as value from khfa_fapz where khnf= cast(substr('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) and yyzlbh=2 and khdx='1'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct pz.wdmc as key, pz.wdmc as value from khfa_fapz fa inner join khfa_khzbpz pz on fa.fabh=pz.fabh where fa.khdx='1' and fa.yyzlbh=2 and pz.fabh = $fabh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct jglb.lbdh as key,jglb.lbmc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg on fapz.fabh=yyjg.fabh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=yyjg.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq where fapz.khdx='1' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and yyjg.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and yyjg.fabh=$fabh$
